title: ROV Pre-Dive Check
purpose: Confirm the vehicle is safe and ready for launch.
safety: Lock out tag out for high-voltage circuits when hands are in panels.
Keep propulsion disabled until all hands are clear.

steps.title: Power and comms
text: Verify surface power is stable and breakers are set.
Bring up telemetry and confirm heartbeats from all nodes.

steps.title: Leak checks
text: Inspect housings for moisture or condensation.
Check oil compensation levels and look for sheen.

steps.title: Motion and cameras
text: Test basic thruster jogs (short pulses only).
Cycle cameras and lights; confirm feeds are clean.
notes: Disable thruster test if divers are in the water.

checks: Swap topside fiber if in doubt

notes: Record findings in the dive log.
